page.title: 14Leigh Bakery 2
page.content: When the silo is almost empty, a warning bell rings. They phone up the man who comes and delivers the flour. The bakery is in 4 parts, the most interesting part was the bread making and the confectionery. The bread oven can hold 240 loaves and can bake them in15-20 minutes. The rack oven can hold 1120 rolls and bakes them in about 30 minutes. There were 3 other machines, a divider, a prover and a moulder. The confectionery is where all kinds of cakes are made, birthday cakes, wedding cakes, and novelty cakes. There are engine shaped cakes. There were some for Father's Day. I really enjoyed my trip to the bakery. Written by Katherine Read (9yrs)
